sentences.en: “technicians who can toss off the Romantic blockbusters with stupendous speed and ease”(&b{Annalyn Swan})
sentences.cn: “能够以令人叹为观止的速度完成传奇性的巨型炸弹的技术人员”(&b{安纳莱恩·斯旺})

sentences.en: "We might toss up for it," suggested Ted. "If it's heads, then we'll talk."
sentences.cn: “我们可以掷硬币来决定。”特德建议道，“如果是正面，我们就谈谈。”

sentences.en: Add the grated orange rind and toss the apple slices in the mixture.
sentences.cn: 加入磨碎的橙皮，再将苹果片在其中轻拌。

sentences.en: Australia won the toss and put England in to bat.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚队掷币获胜，要求英格兰队首先击球。

sentences.en: Bangladesh won the toss and decided to bat first.
sentences.cn: 孟加拉国队掷硬币赢了，决定先击球。

sentences.en: Do not toss the salad until you're ready to serve.
sentences.cn: 到快上菜时再轻轻搅拌色拉。

sentences.en: He worked steadily, and fast, pausing only to toss away clumps of grass roots.
sentences.cn: 他平稳快速地工作着，只在扔掉草根块儿时停顿一下。

sentences.en: I don't give a toss what people think.
sentences.cn: 我才不在乎人们怎么想呢。

sentences.en: I don't give a toss what you think.
sentences.cn: 我不在乎你怎么想。

sentences.en: I'll toss you for who pays the bill.
sentences.cn: 我和你掷钱币决定谁来付账。

sentences.en: I’ve been tossing and turning all night.
sentences.cn: 我一晚上辗转反侧。

sentences.en: It would be better to decide it on the toss of a coin.
sentences.cn: 还不如用抛硬币的方法来决定。

sentences.en: It's a toss-up whether oil prices will go up or down over the days ahead.
sentences.cn: 油价在今后的日子里会上涨还是下跌都有可能。

sentences.en: Just toss it in the rubbish.
sentences.cn: 把它扔进垃圾桶就可以了。

sentences.en: Let's toss to see who pays it.
sentences.cn: 让我们来掷钱币决定谁付账吧.

sentences.en: Remove from the heat, add the parsley, toss and serve at once.
sentences.cn: 端离炉子，加上欧芹，颠起翻面后就立刻上桌。

sentences.en: some of the best letters are tossed off in a burst of inspiration.
sentences.cn: 有些书信佳作就是在灵感的触动下一挥而就的。

sentences.en: The matter made him toss in the bed.
sentences.cn: 那件事使他在床上翻来覆去.

sentences.en: The rest of us really couldn't give a toss; money's what we want.
sentences.cn: 我们其余这些人根本不在乎：我们想要的就是钱。

sentences.en: To prevent any argument, I'll toss you for who does the washing - up.
sentences.cn: 为避免争执, 我和你来掷钱币决定谁洗碗碟.

sentences.en: To put it crudely, nobody really gives a toss about this any more.
sentences.cn: 说难听的，没人会真的再在乎这种事了。

sentences.en: Toss the carrots in some butter before serving.
sentences.cn: 上桌前把胡萝卜放在黄油里搅拌一下。

sentences.en: Well, who gives a toss about sophistication anyway?
sentences.cn: 嗯，不管怎样，谁会在意高雅时髦呢？

words.tran_cn: 投掷；摇荡；投掷的距离；掷币赌胜负
辗转；被乱扔；颠簸；掷钱币决定某事

phrases.tran_cn: 对(决定)提出异议(或辩论)；争论已决定的事，作无谓的争执
抛硬币决定问题；掷硬币猜正反面的赌博
抛煎饼（将平底锅中煎饼往空中一抛，使其翻面落回锅中）
辗转反侧；翻来覆去难以入睡
干杯：突然斜杯子，一口气喝下去
轻而易举地完成：不付任何力量或轻松地做或完成

phrases.phrase: toss oneself/someone off( or toss off)

phrases.tran_cn: （不假思索或不费力地）迅速完成
掷钱币决胜负；匆匆准备

trans.tran_cn: 掷硬币决定，向上甩头，猛仰头（尤指表示恼怒或不耐烦），（尤指比赛或游戏中）投掷
trans.tran_en: the act of throwing a coin in the air to decide something, especially who will do something first in a game
to keep changing your position in bed because you cannot sleep
to throw something, especially something light, with a quick gentle movement of your hand

trans.tran_cn: 掷钱币来决定；翻来覆去
trans.tran_en: to keep changing your position in bed because you cannot sleep

trans.tran_cn: 扔，抛，掷；猛抬；拌；掷；使摇动，使颠簸
trans.tran_en: to throw something, especially something light, with a quick gentle movement of your hand

trans.tran_cn: 扔，抛，（使）摇荡，摇匀，掷硬币决定
